title: Create Performance Max Campaign
description: Schema for creating a new Performance Max campaign with all necessary settings

account_id.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no dashes)

campaign_name.description: Name of the Performance Max campaign

daily_budget_micros.description: Daily budget in micros (1,000,000 micros = 1 currency unit). For THB, 1500 THB = 1500000000 micros

daily_budget_currency.description: Daily budget in actual currency (e.g., 1500 for 1500 THB). Will be converted to micros automatically

target_roas.description: Target Return on Ad Spend (e.g., 2.5 means 250% ROAS)

merchant_center_id.description: Google Merchant Center account ID to link

feed_label.description: Feed label to filter products from Merchant Center

start_date.description: Campaign start date in YYYY-MM-DD format

end_date.description: Campaign end date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)

asset_group_name.description: Name for the default asset group (optional, will use campaign name + ' Assets' if not provided)

final_url.description: Final URL for the asset group
